title: The origins of Covid
description: To find out where a virus comes from, researchers compare it to other viruses to try to trace its origin. This leads to claims like SARS-CoV-2 is 91 or even 96% similar to other known viruses. But what does that really mean?  Tim Harford talks to the virus ecologist Marilyn J Roossinck.
itunes:subtitle: How similar are the Covid strains?
itunes:summary: To find out where a virus comes from, researchers compare it to other viruses to try to trace its origin. This leads to claims like SARS-CoV-2 is 91 or even 96% similar to other known viruses. But what does that really mean?  Tim Harford talks to the virus ecologist Marilyn J Roossinck.
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
